channel.title: Union County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Union County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 270
item.description: I-84/US-30 east approaching Exit 270 - Ladd Creek Road. No return to the freeway eastbound on Exit 270.

item.title: River Lane East at US-30 East And Approaching I-84
item.description: River Lane East at US-30 East to Haines. Approaching onramp for I-84. Use I-84 east to Baker City; I-84 West/US-30 West for La Grande. OR-237 North begins at the I-84 interchange. Use OR-237 for North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84
item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: US-30 East - La Grande
item.description: Entering La Grande on US-30 east. La Grande is the county seat of Union County and home to Eastern Oregon University.

item.title: I-84 West (Exit 248) Offramp at Spring Creek Road
item.description: I-84 West (Exit 248) Offramp at Spring Creek Road. Turn right for Kamela; left for Spring Creek Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 259
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 259 - US-30/La Grande/National Historic District. Overhead for I-84 to Baker City and Ontario. US-30 leaves I-84 eastbound here, and rejoins with I-84 on the other side of LaGrande. LaGrande is the county seat of Union County.

item.title: End OR-244 at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-244 at I-84/US-30 at Hilgard Junction. Merge right for I-84/US-30 East to LaGrande; merge left for I-84/US-30 west to Hilgard and Pendleton.

item.title: OR-82 East at I-84 West (Exit 261)
item.description: OR-82 East at I-84 West (Exit 261) to Pendleton. Continue east on OR-82 for Elgin and Wallowa Lake.

item.title: OR-203 Shield in Union
item.description: OR-203 Shield in Union crossing Catherine Creek.

item.title: OR-203 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-203 north. Distance to Union.

item.title: OR-203 North - Medical Springs
item.description: Entering the community of Medical Springs on OR-203 North.

item.title: OR-203 North - Telocaset Lane
item.description: OR-203 North at Telocaset Lane to Telocaset. Turn right to continue north on OR-203 to Medical Springs and Union.

item.title: OR-203 North - Union County
item.description: Entering Union County on OR-203 north.

item.title: End OR-203 North at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-203 north at I-84/US-30. Turn left for I-84 west; continue under freeway for I-84 east.

item.title: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left for I-84 west to Pendleton; continue straight for I-84 east, and US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: OR-203 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-203 north to La Grande.

item.title: OR-203/OR-237 North at OR-203/OR-237 Split
item.description: OR-203/OR-237 North at OR-203/OR-237 Split. Turn right for OR-237 north to Cove; turn left for OR-203 north to Hot Lake and La Grande.

item.title: OR-237/OR-203 North Approaching OR-237
item.description: OR-237/OR-203 North approaching OR-237 north to Cove.

item.title: OR-237 North at OR-203 South
item.description: OR-237 north at OR-203 south in Union. Use OR-203 south for Catherine Creek State Park and Medical Springs. OR-203 joins OR-237 north through Union.

item.title: OR-237 North Approaching OR-203
item.description: OR-237 north approaching OR-203 to Catherine Creek State Park and Medical Springs.

item.title: OR-237 North - Entering Union
item.description: Entering Union, Oregon on OR-237 north.

item.title: OR-237 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-237 north. Distance to Union and Cove.

item.title: US-30 West at I-84 and OR-237
item.description: US-30 west at I-84 and OR-237. US-30 joins I-84 west to La Grande. Continue straight for OR-237 and North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84
item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: OR-82 West Approaching US-30
item.description: OR-82 West approaching US-30 and (La Grande) City Center. The overhead sign is attached to the Union Pacific Railroad overpass.

item.title: End OR-204 East at OR-82
item.description: End OR-204 East at OR-82. Use OR-82 east for Wallowa and Enterprise; use OR-82 west for Imbler and La Grande. For OR-82 truck traffic continue ahead.

item.title: End OR-204 East At OR-82
item.description: End OR-204 East at OR-82 in Elgin.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 257
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 257 - Perry

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 257
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 257 - Perry

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 261
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 261 - OR-82/La Grande/Elgin.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 259
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 259 - US-30/La Grande. Overhead for I-84 to Baker City and Ontario.

item.title: I-84 East - La Grande Route Diagram
item.description: Route diagram of La Grande routes on I-84 east approaching Exit 261.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 248
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 248 - Spring Creek Road.

item.title: OR-82 East at OR-237
item.description: OR-82 east at OR-237 to Cove.

item.title: OR-82 West - Elgin
item.description: OR-82 west to Palmer Jct, Weston, and La Grande, in Elgin city center.

item.title: OR-82 West approaching I-84
item.description: OR-82 west approaching I-84 to Baker City and Pendleton.

item.title: OR-82 West at I-84 East
item.description: OR-82 west to La Grande at I-84 east to Baker City.

item.title: OR-82 West at I-84 West
item.description: OR-82 west I-84 west to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 East - La Grande Route Diagram
item.description: I-84 east approaching La Grande. Map of routes in the La Grande area.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 248
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 248, Spring Creek Road.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 265
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 265, OR-203/La Grande/Union.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 268
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 268, Foothill Road.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 270
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 270, Ladd Creek Road.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 273
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 273, Frontage Road.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 278
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 278, Clover Creek, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 261
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 261, OR-82/La Grande City Center/Elgin.

item.description: I-84 west at Exit 268, Foothill Road.

item.description: I-84 west at Exit 273, Frontage Road.

item.description: I-84 west at Exit 278, Clover Creek.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 278
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 278, Clover Creek, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 283
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 283, Wolf Creek Lane, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84/US-30 Exit 283 Onramp
item.description: I-84/US-30 freeway entrance to Baker City/LaGrande. Taken at the Exit 283 - Wolf Creek Lane onramp. The Blue Mountains are in the background.
